p: For maceration: each part powder (1 kg) was extracted by maceration with different solvent for three days (solvent: powder ratio = 2 : 1) and filtered through Whatman no.1 filter paper. The marc was remacerated twice, and the combined filtrate was evaporated by rotary evaporator to give the hexane extract, 95% ethanolic extract, and 50% ethanolic extract of pericarp (PH, P95, and P50), fruit (FH, F95, and F50), and seed (SH, S95, and S50), respectively.
